title: Experienced Web Scraper Required
snippet:
We are in the process of making a price comparing website for a variety of online stores from New Zealand and Australia. The website will compare the prices of clothing and accessories from a list of websites.

What we require is a web scraper that will need to pull information from these websites and store them ready to present in a website. Information pulled will need to to include categories (available sizes, gender, brand, colours etc) as well as be able to be split by clothing type (shirts, shorts, trousers, etc).

We will require someone to make the website once this is complete, so ideally this would be the same person
